column4: On campus is specified as the type of location at which the course is taught.
Off campus (e.g., branch campus, etc.) is specified as the type of location at which the course is taught.
Extension center or site is specified as the type of location at which the course is taught.
Study abroad is specified as the type of location at which the course is taught.
Correctional institution is specified as the type of location at which the course is taught.
Military Base is specified as the type of location at which the course is taught.
Instructional telecommunications is specified as the type of location at which the course is taught.
Auxiliary is specified as the type of location at which the course is taught.
Clinic or hospital is specified as the type of location at which the course is taught.
